bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make honey.
⚫ I have black and yellow stripes.
🐝 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I am a tiny insect that marches in a line. I can carry things much bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧺 I live in colonies with my friends.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🍂 I can be red or black.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I eat leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I can be many different colors.
🦋 I fly around in gardens.

bug.question: I am a beetle that is red with black spots. People say I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My name includes the name of a female.
🔴 I am often seen on plants.
🍀 Farmers like me because I eat other bugs.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I can be found in dark corners.
🕷️ I am not technically an insect!
😨 Some people are scared of me.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am usually green.
🦵 I have very strong back legs.
🎶 You can hear me on a summer night.

bug.question: I live in a shell and carry my house on my back. I like to eat leaves in gardens. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly.
💧 I like damp places.
🏠 My house is part of my body.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I light up without batteries.
🌙 I'm easiest to see on a dark night.
✨ Some people call me a lightning bug.

bug.question: I look like a stick, and I hide in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves.
🌳 I am very good at camouflage.
🌱 My name tells you what I look like.

bug.question: I build a home out of mud, but I am not a beaver. I fly and sting. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 My home has many rooms.
⚠️ I can be aggressive if my home is disturbed.
🏐 My home is like a brown ball

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in the ground.
☀️ I love the sunshine!
💐 You can give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🪵 You can make paper from me.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me in a salad. Sometimes I’m crunchy! What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I'm often in salads.
🐇 Rabbits like to eat me.
🥒 I am a vegetable.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and a green or brown outside. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tall tree.
🥥 I have water inside.
🏖️ You might find me near a beach.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that grows in the desert. Be careful when you touch me!

hints.text: 🏜️ I need very little water.
🌵 I often live in hot, dry places.
💧 I store water inside me.

plant.question: I have a big, round, orange face. You can carve me into a jack-o'-lantern for Halloween.

hints.text: 🎃 I am popular in the fall.
🥧 You can make pie from me.
🧡 I am a type of squash.

plant.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows on a vine. Sometimes I am green or purple. You can make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 I am used to make wine.
🥤 I can be sour or sweet.

plant.question: I am a type of grass that we eat the seeds of. I can be white, brown, or even wild! What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 You might eat me with chopsticks.
🌾 I grow in paddies.
🌍 I am a staple food for many people.

plant.question: I am a plant with a strong smell. People use my leaves to flavor their food. I can be used to make pesto!

hints.text: 🌿 I am a herb.
🇮🇹 I am used a lot in Italian cooking.
💚 My leaves are often green.

plant.question: I am a seed that can pop when heated! People love to eat me at the movies.

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a cob.
🍿 I am a snack.
🎬 You eat me in the cinema
